desc: For over twenty years, our aim at Klas Nursery has been to provide children with a loving, safe and stimulating environment. We’re proud to be recommended by word of mouth by many of our previous families. Come and see what makes us special.

layout.text: A home from home for your child

For over twenty years, our aim at Klas Nursery has been to provide children with a loving, safe and stimulating environment. We’re proud to be recommended by word of mouth by many of our previous families. Come and see what makes us special.
